lines.text: I think you know who killed Juan.
All right. It was you who horned into this valley when there wasn't room for you.
I made room - about fifteen mile!
Yeah, and if you expect me to hold onto it for you, you can go rope a duck.
I don't expect anything from you. I came here to report a murder. And that's the last I'll hear of it.
I'm not so sure. I'm getting pretty sick of the trouble you bring on.
Trouble? You don't know the meaning of the word.
It's a lucky thing for you, I happened to be passing through.
And you are gonna to keep on passing through too.
Why you kill me if I don't?
You know... someday it might come to that.
Well come on Boyce, Did I kill Kid Amador or not?
Why?... Can't you remember?
It escapes me.
Alright Which... you just went on wages.
Why Tom, I dont want wages from you. I just want half the place
When I get finish with the kid, I am comming for you.
You are?... Now how can I help you.
I don't care where you go, or what you do, but I'll find you.
Good luck.
